page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: FROM AGE 3-4 CHILDREN MAY ATTEND PRIVATELY RUN PLAYGROUPS AT A COST OF L1.20 PER HALF DAY. FROM 5-11 THE CHILDREN ATTEND GREAT DALBY PRIMARY SCHOOL. FROM 11-14 THEY GO TO LONGFIELD HIGH SCHOOL, MELTON AND FROM 15-16, MELTON UPPER SCHOOL.ALL THESE ARE FREE.THE CHILDREN ARE TRANSPORTED TOSCHOOL IN BUSES PROVIDED FREE BY LEICS. COUNTY COUNCIL. AT 16 A CHOICE IS MADE BETWEEN A JOB, A YTS SCHEME OR FURTHER EDUCATION AT SIXTH FORM, MELTON FE COLLEGE OR OTHER COLLEGES AT LEICESTER, LOUGHBOROUGH OR FURTHER AFIELD. SOME PARENTS OPT FOR OTHER SCHOOLS IN THE STATE SYSTEM. OTHERS CHOOSE PRIVATE SCHOOLS EG OAKHAM SCHOOL, AT A COST OF L850.OO A TERM.
